title: r/Talesfromthefrontdesk Wife Traps Her Cheating Husband at Hotel!
description:
r/Talesfromthefrontdesk In today's video, a clever wife discovers that her husband is cheating, so she decides to confront him in a truly epic way. She gets a hotel room and then tricks her husband into thinking that his mistress invited him to the room. So, he shows up expecting to see his mistress, but instead finds his angry wife in the hotel room. Oopsie! If you like this video and you want to see more, hit the subscribe button for daily Reddit videos!

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vehuUEkrHn8
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
